instructions.da: Foretag et skarpt højresving mod Destination 1
instructions.de: Am Kreisverkehr scharf rechts Richtung Destination 1
instructions.en: Make a sharp right towards Destination 1
instructions.es: En la rotonda siga cerrada a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: En la rotonda siga cerrada a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Au rond-point, tourner franchement à droite en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Di bundaran, lakukan tajam kanan menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Alla rotonda fai una destra verso Destination 1
instructions.nl: Ga rechtsaf op de rotonde richting Destination 1
instructions.pl: Na rondzie weź ostro w prawo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Na rotatória, vire fechada à direita em direção à Destination 1
instructions.ro: La sensul giratoriu virați brusc dreapta spre Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 üzerindeki göbekli kavşakta keskin sağ yöne dön
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь різко праворуч в напрямку Destination 1
instructions.vi: Quẹo phải gắt về hướng Destination 1
